clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of SMS and Smartphone Interventions for OneTouch Reveal® Experiences
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of SMS and Smartphone Interventions for OneTouch Reveal® Experiences

brief_summary.textblock: Assessment of SMS and Smartphone Interventions for OneTouch Reveal® Experiences with patients with Type I and Type II diabetes.

detailed_description.textblock: The primary objective is to demonstrate improved A1c in study subjects with type 1 and type 2 diabetes using the OneTouch Verio® Flex BGM and the OneTouch Reveal® Mobile APP system over a period of 24 weeks, compared to subjects using the OneTouch Verio® Flex BGM.

primary_outcome.measure: A1c change from baseline in subjects using the OneTouch Verio® Flex BGM and the OneTouch Reveal® Mobile APP system compared to subjects using only the OneTouch Verio® Flex (without Bluetooth) for 24 weeks.

secondary_outcome.measure: Quantity and percentage of glucose results within personalized glycemic ranges set by HCP at baseline.
Percentage of patients that performed SMBG tests as instructed by HCP.
OneTouch Reveal Mobile APP interaction and usage via APP analytics over 24wks.

other_outcome.measure: Change in patient satisfaction ( DTSQ survey)
Number of SMS messages sent by the HCP
Healthcare efficiency survey by the HCP

arm_group.description: Subjects with type 1 and type 2 diabetes will be provided with the OneTouch Verio® Flex BGM system only over a period of 24 weeks.
Subjects with type 1 and type 2 diabetes will be provided with the OneTouch Verio® Flex BGM and the OneTouch Reveal® Mobile APP system over a period of 24 weeks.

intervention.description: Diabetes management application for use on a mobile phone.
